net.sourceforge.metrics.ui.dependencies
Class TangleAnalyzer

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--net.sourceforge.metrics.ui.dependencies.TangleAnalyzer
public class TangleAnalyzer
extends java.lang.Object

Analyze the details of class dependencies for all types in the packages of an single tangle (strong component).

Author:
Frank Sauer

Inner Class Summary
 class TangleAnalyzer.PackageCollector
          Find IPackageFragment objects from package names in component
 class TangleAnalyzer.RefCollector
          Collect all type references in the packages of the component.
 class TangleAnalyzer.TypeCollector
          Collect all type declarations in the packages of the component

Constructor Detail

TangleAnalyzer

public TangleAnalyzer(classycle.graph.StrongComponent tangle,
                      java.util.Map dependencies,
                      java.util.Map packages)
The results of analyzing will be stored in the two maps given. dependencies will contain IType-handle => {IType-handle}* associations and packages will contain package-name => {IType-handle}* associations
